alert.note: Alert for Clark; Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 7:26AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clark, west central Grant, southeastern Garland, southwestern Saline and Hot Spring Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 726 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near DeGray Lake State Park, or 9 miles north of Arkadelphia, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Village... Malvern... Rockport... Caddo Valley... Traskwood... Perla... Lonsdale... Hot Springs Memorial Field... DeGray Lake State Park... Hot Springs National Park... Rockwell... Donaldson... Friendship... Bismarck... Magnet Cove... Oaklawn Racetrack... Gifford... Glen Rose... De Roche... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 76 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
